query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, status FROM activations WHERE createdAt > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY status
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, status FROM activations WHERE createdAt > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY status
